name: Lumpy (godhoestudios)
description:
Play as an astronaut of the cosmos repairing a ruined planet. Tractor-beam in comets, asteroids, and gas-teroids to reach equilibrium and sustain life. 

A product of Global Game Jam 2020.

Rotate around the planet with the mouse and control the player with the WASD keys. Left-click on objects in orbit to bring them into the planet. Experiment to find the proper ratio of mass, water, atmosphere, and temperature to sustain life. Once the conditions are right, right-click to plant a plant. Plant five plants to fully repair.

Development Team

Level and Mechanic Design, Particles, Project Management, QA: Emily Waugh 

Coder: David Helbling 

Coder: Jared Burkamper

Art Team

Character Design, Environment, Marketing: Emily Wynkoop 

Environment, Marketing: Kyrah Gayle 

Environment, Graphic Design, Sound: Dustin Downs
